t: Can Amazon Survive? - Knowledge at Wharton
s: August 30, 2000 - Amazon.com is arguably the biggest name in online shopping, the gold standard against which all dotcoms are judged. Is it really possible, then, that someday we will be forced to live in a virtual world without this mammoth bookseller? Certainly, it’s too soon to write a eulogy.

s: The result is a comprehensive, entertaining and illuminating book, featuring case studies from global brands such as adidas and Zippo, providing a gallery of some of the world's best-known brands with rare insight into the secret behind their success.
